!An occupational change means someone with certain abilities and experience gets promoted to a higher-level occupation. If you are an Palus Knight, you can change occupations to a *Shillien Knight* or a *Bladedancer*. Which occupation do you wish to learn about? [npc_%objectId%_Link villagemaster/30474/02.htm|Shillien Knight] [npc_%objectId%_Link villagemaster/30474/05.htm|Bladedancer]Â
